name: MMGuardian
tag_list: mobile-parental-control, mobile-location, parental-control, mobile-application, parental-protection, texting-and-driving, cyber-bullying, geo-zoning
description: Makers of the MMGuardian Mobile App
overview:
MMGuardian is a mobile parental control software company. The company’s primary product offering is the MMGuardian mobile application, which is currently in beta and available on Google Play.

MMGuardian’s application is installed by the parent on their child’s phone and prevents texting while driving, monitors cyber-bullying, and allows parents to locate their child’s phone and perform other analytical functions. More information is available at www.mmguardian.com

MMGuardian is a brand of Pervasive Group Inc. Its founders are James Zhou, a veteran developer, Joel Holl, a seasoned executive in telecom industry, and Paul Grossinger, an entrepreneur.
